line_1: Whose weight the necks of Gallia's sons uphold;
line_2: Point to yon azure Carr bedropp'd with gold,

line_1: And now you should your Friends uphold,
line_2: You are the People who of old

line_1: And now you should your Friends uphold,
line_2: Your Friends and you are bought and sold,
Banter'd the Nation, bought and sold

line_1: Write largely the Pharmacop league to uphold,
line_2: The sons of Machaon, who thirsty for gold

line_1: Will hear my pray'r, and me uphold,
line_2: The God, who all things doth behold,

line_1: Thou best of Beings! all our steps uphold,
line_2: To smooth the passage heavenly scenes unfold,

line_1: For as SOLOMON says, you may safely uphold,
line_2: He ne'er will depart from the same when he's old.
